fields.headline: Vine to present revamped Panorama
fields.bodyText: Jeremy Vine will be the regular presenter on the revamped Panorama when it moves to its new Monday night BBC1 slot. Vine is to be the new face of Panorama, which will move to having a main presenter top and tailing individual reports in its new 30-minute format. Vine joined the BBC in 1987 as a news trainee, then became a reporter on Radio 4's Today programme before moving on to Westminster as a political correspondent. He has been Africa correspondent for the BBC as well as a Newsnight presenter, and he currently hosts a daily weekday lunchtime show on Radio 2. · To contact the MediaGuardian newsdesk email editor@mediatheguardian.com or phone 020 7239 9857.
